e: ￹`Romakat~ `ci~`~ `Pi~`tiro~ `i~ `tongroh~ `no~ `nanom~.￺Peter walked on the surface of the water.￻彼得在水面上行走
￹`Tomirenng~ `ko~ `wawa~ `i~ `tongroh~ `no~ `loma'~.￺The child is standing on the top of the house.￻孩子在屋頂上站立着
￹`Itira~ `i~ `tongroh~ `no~ `loma'~ `ko~ `mali~.￺The ball is on the roof top.￻球在屋頂上面
￹`Ma~`tatongroh~ `ko~ `loma'~.￺The house has two stories / one surface on top of another.￻房子有兩層/一面在另一面的頂上
d.f: ￹￺to put on top of￻放在…的上面
